lead_paragraph: The American midfielder DaMarcus Beasley transferred to Scotland’s Glasgow Rangers. Beasley, 25, who helped the United States beat Mexico last Sunday in the Concacaf Gold Cup final in Chicago, was injured for much of last season and played only 18 Premier League games for Manchester City. He was on loan to the English club from PSV Eindhoven. Beasley has 15 goals in 68 international appearances. He won two Dutch Eredivisie titles with PSV.
